messages.title: Standing up for Hertford and Stortford
messages.content: This is a beautiful place to live, but too many people feel left behind. Our NHS, social care system and local schools are all feeling the strain of draconian cuts. Local bus and rail services are often totally inadequate or expensive and unreliable.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Proper funding for our NHS, social care system and education.
A transport system that puts people before profit.
Good jobs with a proper living wage for all -- an end to zero hours contracts.

issues.education: Proper funding for our NHS, social care system and education.
issues.health: Proper funding for our NHS, social care system and education.

images.caption: Your local Labour Team was in your road today

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Hanifl Islam on behalf of Katherine Chibah, all at 32 Barley Croft, Hertford, Herts. SG14 3LN. Printed by Mobile Stationery and Printing Centre Ltd, Unit 10, Watchmead, Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire SG13 1QN.
